message.body: Hey! I was thinking of coming back to Phil sometime soon. Is there any weekend that you'll be around/having an amazing time?
Yeah!!!!
Also I have a chance to show art at second floor of Vetri- do you have any new pieces or should I just look at your site?!
Would you be interested? It's super fancy and will be a first Friday destination
I'm interested- it's a restaurant? I have quite a few new pieces but what is the timeline?
Yes but the second floor isn't a dining area- it's just fancy expensive drinks and art
It won't be open when restaurant is open- it's an 'apertif'
Not for months at least so you have time!
Showing the chef my paintings tonight ~nervous~
Ooh! I like fancy expensive drinks haha
Good luck let me know how it goes I'm sure you'll be awesome
But so does this mean I can stay with you again? Like next Friday?
Porch swing etc ! Nicer house
Def stay w me
Huge kitchen- we can actually enjoy ourselves
And my new roomies are awesome! I have like Eight whew
Yes!!! That all sounds great
They're all insanely friendly /artsy
Also west Philly in the summer = ace
Exactly!
How are you??
Oh sweet lord haha
I'm good! So much has changed since I saw you!
But also not really and it's ok! I just moved
And now that I live alone have to be really proactive about socializing
And did a few art things which was great!
It's the summer! Exclamation points!
Oooh yeah I can't live alone for exactly that reason
I start isolating
Yeah it's really a struggle. I like it though. Seems like a good spring for both of us!
Yes! Can't wait to be debriefed about your art shows and also we should try planning a painting gig together (show/residency, etc)
See you next Friday. Text if you change plans- I'm super flexible
Definitely!
